# Today News Document

**Today News - News Portal, Blog and Newspaper WordPress Theme**

![screenshot](./img/screenshot.avif)

Today News is a WordPress theme perfect for news, magazine, blog, and publishing websites. The theme comes with powerful theme options to help you manage or customize your website without difficulty or effort. Enable or disable all options with a simple click. Fully customizable, responsive, and optimized for performance, Today News ensures your website will look great all the time.
